meanings.definition: A type of soup made with vegetables and sometimes meat.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious ptisans with fresh vegetables.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, a bowl of hot ptisans is all I need to feel better.
meanings.sent3: The ptisans bubbled on the stove, filling the house with a savory aroma.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a warm bowl of ptisans on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ptisans looked like a work of art in the bowl.

meanings.definition: A warm, comforting broth often used as a remedy for illness.
meanings.sent1: When I'm sick, my mom always makes me her special ptisans to help me feel better.
meanings.sent2: The hospital served steaming ptisans to the patients to soothe their throats.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed to enjoy the smell of the healing ptisans.
meanings.sent4: The ptisans worked like magic, chasing away my cold in no time.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the ptisans filled the room, bringing a sense of comfort and healing.
